backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles and read-only phone/crypto report queries using Map structures.
feature_evidence.json: JSON document listing feature evidence entries with associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten collection of short summaries describing various frontend files and their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables for the UI.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point linking icons, manifest, metadata, and mounting the React app.
frontend/PHASE3A_READONLY_FRONTEND_NOCHA: Documentation confirming that Phase 3a introduces a read‑only canister requiring no frontend changes.
frontend/PRODUCTION_BUILD_VERIFICATION.m: Checklist covering routes, consent gate, branding, analysis flows, database lookups, and multilingual behavior for production readiness.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects known routes back to the app shell while showing basic branding.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining AntiFraud’s name, start URL, colors, orientation, and icon set.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Implements PWA caching with install, activate, and fetch handlers using a versioned cache and network-first strategy.
frontend/PWA_WEBAPK_ANDROID_TEST.md: Step‑by‑step guide for verifying WebAPK installation behavior on Android Chrome.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component configuring routing, consent gate, PWA install flow, service worker registration, and layout providers.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Defines an IDL service exposing a single analyzeText function that takes and returns text.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the main layout with header, navigation, language/auth controls, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/AuthControl.tsx: Renders login button or authenticated user menu based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/components/CollaborativeRes: Displays collaborative lookup results with risk score, categories, and status alerts.
frontend/src/components/ConsentGateModal: Modal requiring acceptance of cookies and terms before app usage, with navigation to terms/privacy.
frontend/src/components/DashboardQuickAc: Empty placeholder file for dashboard quick actions.
frontend/src/components/InstallButton.ts: Button that triggers PWA installation and shows an alert if not eligible.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Language picker dropdown allowing users to switch between supported translations.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallAction: Small PWA install action button that invokes the triggerPWAInstall helper.
frontend/src/components/ReportSubmission: Dialog component that validates and submits fraud reports with rate limiting and form state handling.
frontend/src/components/StructuredAnalys: Displays structured fraud analysis results including risk, explanation, recommendation, sources, and metadata.
Renders user info, browsing history, and logout controls using Internet Identity and stored profile data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAntiFraudActors.ts: Initializes and tracks multiple anti-fraud canister actors and logs a one-time readiness report.
frontend/src/hooks/useConsentGate.ts: Handles user consent persistence and determines whether consent is required based on versioned local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity loading via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Placeholder hook file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPromptCo: Placeholder hook file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Manages user-specific history storage keyed by principal with load, add, and clear operations.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides a React context for language selection and translations, persisting the chosen language in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines the Portuguese translation dictionary used throughout the app.
frontend/src/ic/actors.ts: Creates DFINITY canister actors for main, extra, and reports canisters using a shared HTTP agent.
frontend/src/ic/canisterIds.ts: Stores static canister IDs and exposes a helper to retrieve them by type.
frontend/src/ic/idl/extra.idl.ts: Defines the IDL and TypeScript interface for extra canister methods related to phone and crypto report lookups.
frontend/src/ic/idl/main.idl.ts: Defines the IDL and interface for the main canister’s text analysis method.
frontend/src/ic/idl/reports.idl.ts: Defines the IDL and interfaces for submitting reports and querying risk data from the reports canister.
frontend/src/ic/readinessReport.ts: Generates and logs a readiness report indicating availability and method presence for each canister actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode, and accessibility-focused global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, sets up React Query and Internet Identity provider, and renders the app.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentationPage.tsx: Renders the documentation page with translation text, SEO setup, and a button to generate the PDF documentation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page providing tabs to analyze messages, emails, phone numbers, and crypto addresses with error handling and result rendering.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Explains verification methods using accordion sections and sets SEO metadata with defensive rendering of translated content.
frontend/src/pages/InstitutionalMissionP: Empty page placeholder with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/InstitutionalPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/MissionPage.tsx: Displays mission‑related sections with icons and translated paragraphs, also setting SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Renders privacy policy sections using translated text and sets SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders terms and conditions sections using translated text and sets SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pwa/install.ts: Implements deferred PWA installation prompt handling and a trigger function to initiate installation.
frontend/src/router/useSimpleRouter.ts: Lightweight custom router that tracks path changes via events and provides navigate and currentRoute state.
frontend/src/utils/antifraudTextNormaliz: Utility functions for normalizing text and detecting keywords using accent-insensitive matching.
Builds a Portuguese documentation structure using translation keys and static sections for branding, institutional pages, terms, and privacy policy.
frontend/src/utils/emailHeuristics.ts: Provides deterministic frontend email risk scoring by checking domains, TLDs, typosquatting patterns, randomness, and formatting.
frontend/src/utils/generateDocumentation: Generates a downloadable text file version of the documentation by assembling sections into a structured text output.
frontend/src/utils/localRateLimit.ts: Implements a localStorage‑based cooldown to rate‑limit user submissions and report remaining time.
frontend/src/utils/messageHeuristics.ts: Analyzes messages for scam indicators using keyword weights, crypto patterns, URLs, punctuation, and capitalization to assign a risk score.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Sets page title and meta description dynamically with AntiFraud branding for SPA routes.
frontend/src/utils/structuredFraudAnalys: Defines a structured heuristic fraud‑analysis engine with localization templates and indicator labeling for multiple risk levels.
frontend/src/utils/translateBackendResul: Performs dictionary‑based translation of backend analysis text from Portuguese into other languages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing) and persisting them in sessionStorage, plus utilities to clear stored params.
frontend/src/utils/userProfileStorage.ts: Manages user profiles in localStorage, storing history entries and preferences keyed by principal.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining themes, colors, typography, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current build state, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for the AntiFraud app.
